segments.text: This kitchen drawing makes me feel down.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's so intent on her plate, ignoring the world.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The overflowing sink is a sign of neglect.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water pooling on the floor, no one cares.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children climbing for cookies adds to the risk.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That unstable stool could cause a bad fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy looks focused, but it's dangerous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister waits patiently, but I worry for them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're just kids being kids, yet it's hazardous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden view is beautiful, a bit of joy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It highlights how the inside is falling apart.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope nothing bad happens in this moment.
segments.speaker: PAR
